title: Blessing's Hosting the FIRST EVER Disney & Marvel Games Showcase! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.15.22
description:
Tim and Imran are joined by the host of Disney & Marvel's first ever Games Showcase Blessing Adeoye Jr.! Let's talk about our hype, Spider-Man's scrapped multiplayer, a leaked Avatar: The Last Airbender Game, and Ghost of Tsushima's movie being fully Japanese.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:44 - Housekeeping

MinnMax Trivia Tower is happening tonight and Snowbike Mike is hosting it for a HYPE Kinda Funny MinnMax crossover. That’s happening at 6pm pacific over on Youtube.com/MinnMax


The Roper Report  -

00:04:28 - Disney and Marvel are having a Games Showcase at D23!
00:16:02 - Insomniac’s Spider-Man may have scrapped a multiplayer mode
00:23:32 - New Avatar: The Last Airbender Console Game Seemingly Leaks
00:31:15 - Ad
00:33:30 - Ghost of Tsushima’s movie director wants to make it a Japanese-Language Film with a Japanese Cast
00:38:48 - Private Division Announces Publishing Partnership with Wētā Workshop
00:42:30 - Everything shown during the THQ Nordic Showcase 2022
00:48:53 - MultiVersus’ next fighters have been revealed
00:53:49 - Out today
00:54:33 - Squad Up: Philip - PS5 - PhilipJS (Discord: PhilipJS#4666)
00:55:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Blessing
